text:
Victoria Spartz (née Kulheyko) (); born October 6, 1978) is a Ukrainian-American politician and businesswoman. She is a member of the United States House of Representatives from Indiana's 5th congressional district since 2021.
Spartz is the first Ukrainian-born member of the U.S. Congress and the first member born in a then-Soviet Republic.
She was a member of the Indiana Senate from the 20th District.
